lead_paragraph: Hoping to avoid last-minute financial pressures, Japanese officials said Wednesday they are determined to keep total costs of the 2020 Tokyo Olympics Games below 2 trillion yen ($18 billion) after a three-day debriefing from organizers of the Rio de Janeiro Games.

headline.print_headline: Tokyo Organizers Promise Cost-Cutting for 2020 Olympics
headline.main: Tokyo Organizers Promise Cost-Cutting for 2020 Olympics
